column5: I can absolutely relate. For my it hits hardest when I think it's family or friends from back home (I don't live in the same state as them). It's so hard to explain to someone that you just need reassurance that everything is okay. I always feel like I'm coming off as clingy or annoying. The people that love you and understand you will never have a problem telling you "of course I love you, and you can always ask me if you need too".
